div.p: THE ORIGINAL HAMMER GINSENG & COFFEE CANDY SUPPLIER SINCE 1999
THE ORIGINAL HAMMER GINSENG & COFFEE CANDY SUPPLIER SINCE 1999

div.div: “The condition of men after the age of 30 has a physiological problem such as decreased libido, erectile dysfunction, premature ejaculation, poor quality and quantity of sperm. According to statistics, every day the clinic at major hospitals receives hundreds of visits, many times more than 10 years ago.”

The main component of the Hamer Ginseng & Coffee Candy for Cynomorium, the main effect is used to replenish yang (to treat impotence and back pain), raise tendons and bone, qi and blood, constipation (usually occurs in elderly patients)

Improve our physical fitness, and maintain a healthy and happy life. Get the amino acid supplement from Khanma’s sugar, especially during exercise, which will quickly make your body more agile and powerful.

Hamer Candy contains Cynomorium polysaccharide, rich in 15 kinds of amino acids, three paste saponins, natural glucocorticoid, 23 kinds of trace elements and various antioxidants. Can inhibit HIV, blood pressure and improve blood circulation.

“Hamercandy was developed by Sino-USA Collaboration Technology, a total of 13,500 people participated in research and development, after 15 years of research and development. Because it has been confirmed to be very effective in rapidly replenishing human cell nutrition and delaying the aging process, it has been registered as a patented intellectual property, and has been the preferred cell nutrition product for athletes for several years.”

As a training for athletes, the rapid replenishment of food, effectively improve the nervous system, strengthen the explosive, reduce fatigue, improve training and competition performance, because the hormone does not contain western medicine and doping ingredients, consistent with the needs of participants.

Hamercandy is made up of valuable Cynomorium plant extract, ginseng saponin, hydrolyzed protein (peptide) and maltose. It can inhibit the destruction of free radicals in the human body, and it can supplement cell nutrition, promote amino acid synthesis of protein, regulate cell function.

“ALS Laboratory Group (Singapore) laboratory report: no impotence Western medicine or doping ingredients”, “halal product certification”, “Ministry of Health food safety and quality control documents. This product is classified as food without a MAL number “Certificate.
Good Manufacturing Practice (GMP) Certificate of Sino – USA Collaboration Technology
The Code To Cell Activation From The Mysterious Desert
